derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Greek aphrodisiakos, from aphrodisios, from Aphroditē (see Aphrodite

entry.def: An aphrodisiac is a food, drink, or drug which is said to make people want to have sex.

example.ex: Asparagus is reputed to be an aphrodisiac.

means.word_mean: 1. a drug or other agent that stimulates sexual desire
